h1_title: Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind
h2_title: How to Find Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind
h3_title: Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind
Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind at Yoaguai Chiefs you'll go up against in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. The pair of heads will attack using fire, and are the last bosses you'll fight as part of the Woods of Ember pathway.
## How to Find Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind
You can find this duo immediately after fighting the Gray-Bronze Cart.
### Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind Boss Fight and Guide

Enter a large open area to find the fox guai suspended from a tree, and her two captors on the way. After she explains that she's been captured, two giant heads will descend upon the arena.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic boss fight scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, as described in the "Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind Boss Fight and Guide" section. A player character, armed with a staff-like weapon, stands in a dark, rocky arena surrounded by eerie, fire-lit structures. Two distinct boss enemies are visible: a fiery, horned head floating menacingly in the air and a large, pale head resting on the ground. This visual aligns with the preceding text, which describes the encounter with the two giant heads, "Quick as Fire" and "Fast as Wind," in Chapter 5 of the game.
